channel.title: Adding chaotics?
channel.description:
So I have a PI source I'm trying to add in chaotics. I havn't touched a source in 3-4 years so I've forgotten much of this. I believe what I need to do is to add them into "equipment.dat"? However I don't have the editable file for that, if it's the case?
I been trying to search around the site and still unsure.
Thanks. :)
Edit: Currently the weapons wield onto the head, I havn't done anything to add them in.
[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1885/42901857.png[/img] This is the issue, the chaotics equip to the head slot, not the weapon.

item.title: Adding chaotics?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“green__gp, post:1, topic:474712”]So I have a PI source I’m trying to add in chaotics. I havn’t touched a source in 3-4 years so I’ve forgotten much of this. I believe what I need to do is to add them into “equipment.dat”? However I don’t have the editable file for that, if it’s the case?

I been trying to search around the site and still unsure.

Thanks.

Edit: Currently the weapons wield onto the head, I havn’t done anything to add them in.


This is the issue, the chaotics equip to the head slot, not the weapon.[/quote]

This is server sided, I’m not sure what the name of the file is called, but in a certain “.java” file you are mean’t to edit where certain items equip.

After you change where the item equips the chaotic maul or whatever chaotic weapon will go into the right equip slot,

Hopefully that made sense.

[hr]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding chaotics?
item.dc:creator: @green_gp1 green__gp
item.description:
@green_gp1 wrote:

They aren’t in the server, I’ve added stats and such to them in the item db for the server. I just havn’t added them to a slot, and pretty unsure how to.
